title: Forgivable Ex-husband - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Yi Yi Meng Fei   旖旎萌妃
description: Gu Yi and Xiao Qian married each other because of their families. During this time, Xiao Qian only put one condition for Gu Yi: their marriage will have nothing to do with love. This six year long marriage of theirs will eventually fall apart because of the return of a certain woman. His white moonlight. Should she back off now?>
